Split-Screen Content Section with Image.Layout: Horizontal split-screen design with an image on the left and content on the right.
Split-Screen Content Section with Image.Design: Clean and structured. The section includes a headline, descriptive text, and a call-to-action button, all complemented by a background image for visual engagement.

Key Elements.Image: Positioned on the left (or top on small screens), it provides visual context and engagement.
Key Elements.Headline: Prominently displayed, large, and bold to capture attention.
Key Elements.Descriptive Text: Supports the headline with additional information, using a smaller font size.
Key Elements.Call-to-Action Button: A prominent button located at the bottom of the content block for user engagement (e.g., “Contact support”).

Split-Screen Content Section with Image.Use Cases: Ideal for help centers, customer support pages, and informational sections that require a visual element alongside textual content.
